titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the existing suspension of duty on 6-Hydroxy-2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, and its sodium, potassium, and ammonium salts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on 6-hydroxy-2-naphthalene-sulfonic acid and its sodium, potassium, and ammonium salts.
